original_title: Over 7,000 dansals registered for Vesak: PHI Union
original_body_lines: At least 7,160 dansal organized across Sri Lanka in view of the Vesak festival have been registered with the Health Ministry by Thursday, Public Health Inspectors' Union Chairman Upul Rohana said.

"All dansal, registered and unregistered will be monitored by the Public Health Inspectors on Vesak Day and the following day.We will be guiding organizers with instructions to ensure hygiene and public safety," Rohana said.
He said some 3,000 Inspectors will be deployed to monitor these dansal due to health concerns relating to the heavy rains experienced across the country.
